foreignData.name: 硬盔虫大群
foreignData.text: 在你的维持开始时，若你操控五个或更多地，在硬盔虫大群上放置四个+1/+1指示物。

name: Scute Mob
originalText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control five or more lands, put four +1/+1 counters on Scute Mob.

rulings.text: Scute Mob’s ability has an “intervening ‘if’ clause.” That means (1) the ability won’t trigger at all unless you control five or more lands as your upkeep starts, and (2) the ability will do nothing if you control fewer than five lands by the time it resolves.

text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control five or more lands, put four +1/+1 counters on Scute Mob.
